Crimes.Crime_Name: Inadmissibility under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act subsection 34(1)(f)
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Reasonable grounds to believe organization engaged in terrorism
Crimes.Target_Entity: Canadian immigration and refugee protection system
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: Long-term membership, awareness of Amal's activities
Crimes.Nature_of_Membership: General membership; claim of civil wing involvement unsubstantiated
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: Lack of evidence supporting distinction between civil and military wings
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Applicant's claim not supported by evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Factors: Failure to substantiate civil wing involvement
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Claim deemed not credible due to lack of corroboration
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Insufficient proof of limited, non-terrorist involvement
Crimes.Authority_Decision: Found applicant inadmissible due to membership in terrorist organization
Crimes.Process: Refugee status determination with inadmissibility assessment

Crimes.Crime_Name: Being a member of an organization that there are reasonable grounds to believe engages, has engaged or will engage in terrorism
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Reasonable grounds to believe Amal engaged in terrorism
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Membership in a designated terrorist organization
Crimes.Target_Entity: Canadian public order and national security
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: Sustained association with Amal, knowledge of its operations
Crimes.Nature_of_Membership: Undifferentiated membership; no credible separation from terrorist wing
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: No evidence validating exclusive civil engagement
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Claim of non-terrorist role not corroborated
Crimes.Credibility_Factors: Duration of membership undermines claim of innocence
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Demeanor and lack of documentation reduce credibility
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Failure to provide supporting documentation for civil role
Crimes.Authority_Decision: Determined Nassereddine inadmissible based on membership
Crimes.Process: Inadmissibility hearing followed by judicial review
